attributes.action: Demand the resignation of PM Theresa May
attributes.additional_details: When the British people voted for Brexit they voted clearly & concisely to leave the European Union, not in part but in whole. The Prime Minister is not & has not delieved the peoples will but instead betrayed the peoples will.
attributes.background: The Prime Minitster Theresa May has Betrayed the peoples will & domoctratic vote, she dors not serve the people or the country regarding Brexit, therefore loosing the peoples support so she must resign.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or UK Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or UK Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
